content: That's great, thanks for the ideas! I'll definitely try out some of those recipes. By the way, I've been thinking of getting a new cow, maybe a brown Swiss or a jersey, to increase my milk production. I've been doing some research online and talking to some other farmers in the area, and I think I might be ready to make the investment soon. Do you have any advice on what to consider when selecting a breed and how to care for them?
